explains: adj. 含糖的；甜的；糖状的；甜言蜜语的

sentences.en: Sugary canned drinks rot your teeth.
sentences.cn: 高糖的罐装饮料会让你得蛀牙。

sentences.en: These children were physically in better shape and drank fewer sugary soft drinks.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子的身体状况更好，喝的含糖软饮料也更少。

sentences.en: They eat too many fatty and sugary foods, but they are not eating enough to be fat.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了太多含脂肪和糖的食物，但他们吃的还不够他们变胖。
